params.id: The ID of the dNFT for which the vault is being added.
params.vault: The address of the vault contract to be added.

params.amount: The amount of DYAD to be burned.
params.id: The ID of the dNFT for which the DYAD is being burned.

params.amount: The amount of assets to be deposited.
params.id: The ID of the dNFT for which the deposit is being made.
params.vault: The vault where the assets will be deposited.

params.amount: The amount of DYAD to be minted.
params.id: The ID of the dNFT for which the DYAD is being minted.
params.to: The address where the DYAD will be sent.

params.amount: The amount of DYAD to be redeemed.
params.id: The ID of the dNFT for which the DYAD is being redeemed.
params.to: The address where the collateral will be sent.
params.vault: Address of the vault through which the DYAD is being redeemed        for its underlying collateral.

returns._0: The amount of collateral that was redeemed.

params.id: The ID of the dNFT for which the vault is being removed.
params.vault: The address of the vault contract to be removed.

params.amount: The amount of assets to be deposited.
params.id: The ID of the dNFT for which the withdraw is being made.
params.to: The address where the assets will be sent.
params.vault: The vault where the assets will be deposited.

add(uint256,address).notice: Adds a vault to the dNFT position

deposit(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Allows a dNFT owner to deposit collateral into a vault

remove(uint256,address).notice: Removes a vault from the dNFT position

withdraw(uint256,address,uint256,address.notice: Allows a dNFT owner to withdraw collateral from a vault
